review: I have booked an appointment and I had visited the hospital. ****** *** ****** **** **** *** he had done the check up. I had a surgery done before so I had visited for just normal check up. review: It was a good experience. Dr. Bhatia is very attentive and appears to be very concerned about his patients.  He enquire thourouly about the problem.

I have taken appointment for my routine check up and visited the hospital. Doctor was  quite good and he had done the check up, there was no wait time for in hospital as it was on time. I am completely 100% satisfied with his treatment and any one needs consultation means I would like to recommend this doctor only.
